title: $285 Weekly "Dormer Two" Furn. Apartment in Great Uptown Location
posting_body: ['Monthly: $1100', 'Weekly: $285 plus $45 cleaning', 'Daily: $45 plus $45 cleaning', "You'll get a private room with a comfy bed a shared bathroom and communal kitchen and laundry.", 'Enjoy an affordable stay in a unique boutique hotel in the heart of Uptown, one of the most walkable neighborhoods in the Twin Cities.', "You will be steps away from The Walker Art Center, St. Mary's Basilica and Lake of the Isles.", 'Enjoy modern amenities and convenience in a house where the splendor of the Victorian era has been lovingly preserved.', 'You enter this unique space through the main entrance and climb down one flight of indoor wooden stairs.', 'The brand new queen size bed is framed in reclaimed pine with a dramatic clock serving as a focal point.', 'Red accent walls and lamps set a dramatic mood.', 'The bed features crisp 500 thread count sheets and the floor features radiant heat so your feet will always be toasty.', 'This room offers access to a shared bathroom and kitchen.', 'The automatic Keurig coffee and tea maker along with pods starts your morning with ease.', 'A fully equipped kitchen includes a gas stove, microwave and fridge.', 'Meal prep is simple with a full set of cookware, knives and spices.', 'Enjoy your meal on china dishes with linen napkins at the high top table.', 'The newly remodeled bathroom features all new black tile and twin sinks.', 'You’ll find the shower well stocked with shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and a fresh bar of soap and fluffy white towels in your room.', 'The closet is also equipped with an iron and ironing board.', 'Find a hair dryer conveniently located in the desk.', 'Guests also have access to the washer and dryer.', 'Call Daniel', 'show contact info', '$285 per week plus $45 cleaning fee per stay.', 'Guest access', 'I will provide you with a key upon arrival.', 'You are renting one of six units that are in my home.', 'Interaction with guests', "Don't hesitate to call or text with questions, even if you just need a restaurant suggestion.", 'I am as available as you need me to be!', 'About Me', 'My name is Daniel.', 'I purchased this house in 2001 and have been lovingly renovating it ever since.', 'I have honored the spirit of the original building while thoughtfully adding my own touches and inspiration.', 'One of my great passions in life is Argentine Tango, so I named each apartment after a beloved Argentine musician.', 'If you are curious about the dance scene in the Twin Cities, I’m happy to point you towards the best milongas and I also offer lessons.', 'Other things to note', 'Do you have some time to enjoy?', 'Stroll to the Walker Art Center and visit the outdoor sculpture garden featuring the iconic "Spoon Bridge" or cherry on a spoon.', 'Or head over to Eat Street on Nicollet Ave for a whole world of dining options and pay a visit to the Minneapolis Art Institute.', "If I could only do one thing in Minneapolis, I'd rent a Nice Ride and bike around the sparkling chain of Lakes.", 'Stop at Nightingale for oysters and other fancy bar snacks or pop over to Spyhouse for a caffeine fix.', '#minneapolisfurnishedapartment #minneapolisapartment #minneapolisrent  #uptownapartment', 'Other popular stops in the Twin Cities are The Guthrie Theater, Stone Arch Bridge, Surly Brewing Co for craft beers and delicious food, or a visit to the iconic Mall of America.', 'We’ve got plenty to offer sports fans too with the Minnesota Twins at Target Field, the Timberwolves at Target Center and the Vikings at U.S Bank Stadium.']
